document: This policy applies to Corporate (Multinational) applicants purchasing New Only vehicles. The interest rate is set at 15.1% with a maximum repayment period of 96 months. Applicants must not exceed a Debt Burden Ratio (DBR) of 45%. Minimum verifiable monthly income requirement is 5000 EGP.

This policy applies to Retired / Pensioner applicants purchasing Used (Up to 10 yrs) vehicles. The interest rate is set at 18.75% with a maximum repayment period of 96 months. Applicants must not exceed a Debt Burden Ratio (DBR) of 45%. Minimum verifiable monthly income requirement is 25000 EGP.

This policy applies to Retired / Pensioner applicants purchasing Used (Up to 5 yrs) vehicles. The interest rate is set at 17.68% with a maximum repayment period of 84 months. Applicants must not exceed a Debt Burden Ratio (DBR) of 60%. Minimum verifiable monthly income requirement is 40000 EGP.

This policy applies to Salaried (Private) applicants purchasing Electric/Hybrid vehicles. The interest rate is set at 12.57% with a maximum repayment period of 60 months. Applicants must not exceed a Debt Burden Ratio (DBR) of 50%. Minimum verifiable monthly income requirement is 5000 EGP.

This policy applies to Expat (Remittance) applicants purchasing Commercial Trucks vehicles. The interest rate is set at 15.69% with a maximum repayment period of 72 months. Applicants must not exceed a Debt Burden Ratio (DBR) of 40%. Minimum verifiable monthly income requirement is 25000 EGP.
